postInstallNotes:
DC/OS Spark is being installed!

	Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/spark/
	Issues: https://docs.mesosphere.com/support/

	If you installed from the UI, enter `dcos package install spark --cli` from the DC/OS CLI to install the Spark CLI subcommands.
postUninstallNotes:
The Apache Spark DC/OS Service is being uninstalled.
Follow the instructions at https://docs.mesosphere.com/current/usage/service-guides/spark/uninstall/ to clean up any persisted state.
name: spark
description: Spark is a fast and general cluster computing system for Big Data.  Documentation: https://docs.mesosphere.com/service-docs/spark/
